cab.content: 17 10(This Document Is the Prooertv rv?' ' *t! i - \S ** V^-V 5 f-v \OPERATIONS.SECRET.From General Delme-Radc lii f e , Italy, To C.I.G.S., War Office.Handed in 1.50 p.ra. 14.12.17. Received 7.30 p.m. 14.12.17.10041, December 14th.4th Army. with exception of email gain on Spinoncia reported in my telegram No. 10038, the enemy seems to have been repulsed with heavy losses at all points on front. Italian 6th Army Corps counter-attacked in Cesilla Valley this morning, relieved pressure on front 27th Corps and re-took point 1476 and Pertica which had, however to be abandoned again. The enemy lias made no further attack this morning but the bombardment continues and concentration of enemy troops seems to Indicate intention again to attack.Circulated to War Cabinet 14.12.17
